How can I adjust the mic gain level? You can adjust the mic gain level only by the gain knob at the bottom of the mic, it doesn't work if you adjust the mic gain level in sound settings. Make sure you turn up the gain knob before you use the mic. Can I change the RGB light color? There is no button on the mic to change the RGB light color, it changes automatically.If you are looking for a mic with controllable RGB lights, AmpliGame A8(ASIN:B09YLM3FNC) is a decent choice. Can I turn off the RGB light when the mic is working? No, the gradient RGB light represents that the mic is working. If you want to turn off the RGB light, you have to mute the mic by the mute button on the top of the mic. Is A6V mic compatible with Xbox? This USB gaming microphone is NOT compatible with Xbox, but it works well with PS4/PS5. Does it work with the Android phones or iPhone? We don't recommend using A6V mic with the phones because the phones may not supply sufficient power to the RGB light and the sound quality will be affected. If you have to try, please use a genuine data cable or adapter for connection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moved on from the Snowball
reviews.reviewText: It's such a cute and quality mic without totally breaking the bank. I use this specifically for gaming and streaming and have had zero problems with sound quality and recording. Depending on the environment, you may need to adjust the mic a little bit on the bottom knob or in whatever recording program you use. I personally do not use the tripod stand that it came with and have my mic mounted on a boomarm. Easy to use, easy to install - very plug and play. The touch mute with the light is extremely convenient for the quick mute without having to go into Discord or the game to manually mute myself. I wish I could customize the RGB, but that's not even something to really complain about since it's so cute regardless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for great quality
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this microphone. It sounds very professional and it is affordable compared to others of similar quality.I don’t think it has a software unfortunately, but it doesn’t really need one. It changes colors automatically, the gain control on the bottom is very easy to use and understand, and the large mute button is super convenient.The area I use this microphone in has a large air filter and fan going on in the background and it doesn’t go through for the most part. You also don’t have to be inches away from the mic to pick up your voice which is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this microphone. It has great quality sound and it’s easy to use. Just plug it in adjust the volume and go. The colors are just a bonus to a great mic.(I use this to record voice/lecture on PowerPoint slides.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Reliable USB Mic for Budget-Friendly Streaming
reviews.reviewText: Having recently transitioned to a USB mic due to the demise of my computer's aux port, I stumbled upon the Fifine K669B. Its plug-and-play feature proved convenient, and despite its lightweight plastic construction, it surprisingly feels quite solid. While there are some streaming challenges on Twitch due to background noise sensitivity, it remains a commendable mic overall.Initially, I found the gain knob's bottom placement a bit inconvenient, especially with a short tripod on my desk. However, this was easily addressed by using a low-profile boom arm, significantly improving usability. The top-mounted mute button responds well with a light tap, and the vibrant indicator colors when the mic is active enhance its user-friendliness. The sound quality is satisfactory, and the adjustable gain knob effectively minimizes background noise.Despite the noted considerations, the Fifine K669B emerges as a budget-friendly mic with commendable quality, making it a solid choice for those mindful of its limitations. While pricier options may promise better long-term performance, this mic stands out as a cost-effective solution for users with specific needs and constraints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I gotta say I was really surprised with quality of this microphone, was not expecting this level of ingenuity in this product give the price sounds really great. After 6 months of use it’s still in great condition and it’s even compatible with the ps5.Awesome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Haven't had any issues since I've had it for a few months. Sound quality is good for price. It's pretty. I like the stand, it doesn't get tangled in cords. Worth the buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEFORE YOU BUY, READ THIS - You get what you pay for.
reviews.reviewText: Pros:✦ The quality is great.✦ it's easy to use.✦ doesn't require extra software downloads.✦ The tripod/ legs are really stable.✦ Has a good range of sensitivity /gain (you can adjust it manually/physically in the mic)✦ Good beginner mic.✦ mic can rotate vertically about 150 degrees.✦ gradient RGB.✦ usb cord is decently long.✦ one tap mute/unmute.Cons:✦ it's usb.✦ the tripod/legs are short.✦ mic will turn on (will pick up audio) automatically with power.✦ can't assign a specific/custom RGB color to mic or turn them off.✦ can only rotate vertically.✦ gain nob is not numbered or has any mark indicators.✦ picks up background noise, it can be too sensitive.✦ MUST make primary and ONLY mic source, or else your device will use your other mic sources and pick up audio even though this primary mic is muted.✦ NOT compatible with xbox.My only complaint is that sometimes it doesn't pick up my voice when I talk normally. Keep in mind that naturally, I'm a loud person. So to me, it's weird that it does that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hits WAYYY Above Weight Class
reviews.reviewText: This little guy is an excellent microphone, and the price is wildly competitive especially when bought on sale. The sound is incredible and it legitimately competes with mics triple the price. I use this for both work and gaming on two different PCs, and I don't have to have it directly in front of my face (or on-camera) for it to pick me up. The build quality is a lot of plastic, yes, but it doesn't feel cheap or flimsey. I love the capacitive mute on the top and the RGB that indicates you're muted is an excellent touch. Even though the included tripod was actually quite nice, I did get a boom arm to free up some desk space. Compatibility was no issue; the only tweek necessary was tightening the resistance on the arm so it didn't fly into the air, as the microphone is so lightweight. Just a great plug and play microphone that I easily recommend to just about anyone.

reviews.reviewerName: Ruskayra de Jesus MacêdoRuskayra de Jesus Macêdo
reviews.reviewText: Microfone lindo, extremamente perfeito o áudio, fácil a instalação e vendedor extremamente educado e atencioso

I absolutely love this product. The gain dial is very smooth, the sound quality is great compared to any headset mic. The mic is lightweight so it can easily be paired with a cheap mic arm for amazing sound quality at a low price point. I've been using it for months and it's hasn't caused any trouble. My only complaint is that you cannot control the colour of the light on the Microphone or turn the lights off while keeping the mic unmuted.
se ve muy bonito y ademas funciona bien. buena calidad en la voz con altavoces y en grabaciones. excelente relacion calidad-precio
Go ahead with this Microphone. Very good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Everyone I game with says it so clear to hear and I was using a high end gaming headset mic before, also love the tap to mute system , it's very good looking as well, photo above beside my Logitech g502 for size reference. Definitely recommend especially for the price. Easy step up and real quality feel to it.
